website_summaries.verdict: An affordable acne kit that clears your skin quickly and effectively.
pros: Kit includes the Acne Solutions cleanser, clarifying lotion, and clearing treatment
Products work together to brighten skin and significantly reduce acne
Notice clearer skin in just 2 weeks
Results are not just quick, but also long-lasting
Products can be used on the neck and back as well
cons: Skin takes a few days to adjust to products
You may experience dry skin for 1-3 days

customer_reviews.title: as I had bad acne as a teen and I used the regular ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for my teenage son, as I had bad acne as a teen and I used the regular Clinique line. My son has tried everything. This product appeared to cause the acne to get worse just for a week or so because it pulls all the crap out of your pores and brings them to the surface. I told him to hang in there and not give up, that it WILL work...and it did! He is completely cleared up!! He looks great! The only thing, out of almost 20 products we tried, that worked. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Cream is the best part - toner is stripping (but effective)
customer_reviews.text: The toner is a bit stripping so I wouldn't advise using it every time you wash your face especially if you have naturally dry skin. The face wash is gentle and comes out as a light foam. The cream works pretty but most importantly you can wear it under makeup! It didn't make me oily and acted more like a primer than acne medication.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Dried out my face: (
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Didn't work for me, just dried my skin out- which in 2017, we all know is not ideal. I've been using CeraVe which is a lot cheaper and keeps my face moisturized. I am 26 and female with acne, combination skin.
customer_reviews.author: Bubs

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try this bundle after reading the reviews but had to stop after 2 uses. My face became red and inflamed and very irritated. Washing my face with cool water only offered temporary relief. The discomfort woke me up and cold compresses only helped so much. I don’t usually have sensitive skin so I’m not sure what happened but I will definitely have to look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instant red rash all over face, super drying
customer_reviews.text: I used this skin care system twice in an attempt to clear hormonal acne on my jawline. I was only able to use it twice because it made my face red and super dry. I had to throw this way and thank goodness I ordered the sample size kit. It took about 3 weeks to get my skin back to normal. I would not recommend this at all! Skin Type: My skin is sensitive, but remains relatively clear other than the hormonal acne.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron R

customer_reviews.title: Overnight Success!
customer_reviews.text: I saw an overnight change in my skin—for the better! There is a drying effect from even using it once a day, but nothing a little moisturizer couldn’t fix. Cleared up my breakouts immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn’t match image on box
customer_reviews.text: The product doesn’t match the box and the box is taped with box tape. I feel like this product is a fake.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I ordered this. I have tried everything for my adult acne. I have tried Pro-Active, Murad and all kinds of acne stuff and nothing worked. Then I saw this on Amazon, and ordered it hoping it would work. IT DOES!!!! You use it twice a day and it was a miracle how my face cleared up. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried literally everything on the market for the past 8 years to try and get rid of my acne and this is the ONLY that works. After the first few weeks I could already see a difference and now a few months later my acne is totally gone! It’s also helped my skin texture and also helped with my scars. I really recommend this to anyone struggling with their acne even if you have sensitive skin! It works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Waverly Finch

customer_reviews.title: ... more I buy this brand and I am SOOOOOOOO happy and I adore with this BRAND
customer_reviews.text: This is I think ten times or more I buy this brand and I am SOOOOOOOO happy and I adore with this BRAND
customer_reviews.author: kawther

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I only recieved this 3days ago but started using immediately and I can aready see a difference. I also got sonic brush with blue bristle head to apply foaming cleanser with and my pimples are not red or painful anymore. It’s too early to say if my skin is going to clear completely but for now I have high hopes!
customer_reviews.author: David Kvachadze

customer_reviews.title: I swear by this
customer_reviews.text: You can't buy this set anymore but this combo plus moisturizer works AMAZING. Noticeable difference in a few weeks. Clinique Acne Solutions has helped me so much * use 'clinique' s dramatically different moisturizer'
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: It helps
customer_reviews.text: Love Clinique. Been using this product since I was 14.
customer_reviews.author: Nohemi l.

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY product that works for my acne and I have tried everything under the sun. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: SUZI

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work, only worsens
customer_reviews.text: This product had only made my acne 3x worse within 2 weeks. I thought my acne would get better and my skin was only breaking out because it was new to my face. But this never got better, I got acne on my face where I never have had before.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton Maland

customer_reviews.title: Scam.
customer_reviews.text: The product came in a torn biz. Once we looked further there are no caps on the bottle and the bottles looked refilled. Also the sizes were very very small for the price of $75. Never again will I order Clinique on Amazon. I will always perso ally buy them.
customer_reviews.author: momofalltrades

customer_reviews.title: Know what you’re actually getting
customer_reviews.text: Is Acne solutions the same thing as anti-blemish solutions??? If you’re planning to ship everyone “anti-blemish solutions” then freaking put that on the website. Fraud at its finest.
customer_reviews.author: AY

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my daughter. She loves kit. Has ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter. She loves kit. Has all she needs in one spot. I will definitely be buying again
customer_reviews.author: Michael Whisler

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, did not work
customer_reviews.text: I regret buying this overpriced and amount too little to make any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Melancholic

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Only thing that has word my my combination oil skin. Also, makes my face look softer.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Does an excellent job on clearing up break outs and preventing them as well!
customer_reviews.author: PrimeJunkie1229

customer_reviews.title: Wait and see!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know yet if it serves the purpose. Needs to be used for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Ticklefoot

customer_reviews.title: Open, but would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, wish it wouldn't have been open. I ended up purchasing at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Layton

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Bought several times, works great. These are smaller sample size.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: amazing face care
customer_reviews.text: perfect size for trying a new product, is good for oily acne and clears up pimples fast.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh R.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It kept my acne at bay but didn't heal it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Barber

customer_reviews.title: My face cleared so much when I started using this product.
customer_reviews.text: My face cleared so much when I started using this product.
customer_reviews.author: CloeyBibbs

customer_reviews.title: Worked good for a month
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a month and then came the breakouts. It maybe the change in weather, but either way, it didn’t work. Looks like I’m going back to R&F and eating ramen :(
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: itching
customer_reviews.text: the lotion is allert to my skin. it is itching.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne and oily skin!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!My face looks better and no acne at all.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima Morys

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive combination skin, heavy on the oily tzone. I am 24 and have had acne since middle school. This is the only product besides 2 heavy (and expensive) prescriptions that has ever cleared my skin. I can use this system morning AND night and have no sensitivity or drying issues. My skin is soft and smooth and pimple free. I'm also using rosehip seed oil at night on my whole face to reduce scarring and dark marks, works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: cassidy anne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My teenage daughter used this and it's dramatically cleared up her skin! Will definitely be re ordering!
customer_reviews.author: marilu garcia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works! But you have to do your part in the way you eat
customer_reviews.author: Paulina Soto Ramos

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My skin broke out in a terrible rash, and the rash won't go away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: didn't made it worse but didn't improve either
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for around 3 weeks now, twice a day and it really hadn't done anything for my acne, it stayed exactly the same. didn't made it worse but didn't improve either.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily teenage skin
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teenager, we had tried lots of different products for acne, this is by far the most successful.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Darling

customer_reviews.title: I love the actual product and always have
customer_reviews.text: I love the actual product and always have. It should be mentioned that these are trial/sample size products. They are not full size. I felt a little duped for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Faris

customer_reviews.title: Really a great set for Acne Care.  I can't say enough...
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Clinique products and this one didn't disappoint. It cleared up my acne within 2 weeks and within one week it was already looking better! Just to disclose my full facial regimen I also use a scrubbing brush to get rid of skin sluff and excess oil. In fact with this foaming cleanser I used it directly on the face brush. The electronic face brush I use is this oneand it worked fantastically! It also comes with a facial cleanser which works really well also. However I do not believe the cleanser that comes with the kit is directed at Acne per say like the Clinique Acne solutions.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby B.

customer_reviews.title: Drying. Even for oily skin.
customer_reviews.text: I consider myself to have normal - oily skin, but after a week of using this my skin has become SO DRY. The step 2 lotion feels more like an asringent or toner than a lotion. The system has cleared up my acne quite a bit. No new acne since using this either. I think I'm going to use the cleanser daily, but use the lotion and cream every other day (as directed if dryness/peeling/irritation occurs) and buy another lotion. Not sure if I will buy these items again after my supply runs out - depends on how clear it keeps my skin with only using the acne lotion and cream every other day.
customer_reviews.author: awizzy

customer_reviews.title: Authentic - works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best set of skin care products for acne I've found, by far. It actually works, and it works fast - I see significant improvement after 1 day, clear skin after 4 or 5. I've been using this everyday for a few years now and I haven't experienced any drying, redness, or any of the other side effects people have complained about, but everyone's skin is different. I highly recommend giving this a try - it has done wonders for me, and I hope it will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Cleared my skin
customer_reviews.text: Cleared my skin up, looks healthy. I am very happy with this product. These are small bottles, though. Will last approximately 1 month. I would by the trial kit to make sure it works for you & then you can purchase the full size bottle at the Clinique counter for a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: The best at what it says
customer_reviews.text: Most excellent products! I've had problems with zits, mostly on chin-which they are now saying is hormonal, but these products took care of that and large pores! 68 yrs old, can you believe it? But it's clinique-which I think is the best and what they say products will do -they do!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect trial size. Daughter suffering from acne. This is clearing her breakouts. Does dry skin. Once skin starts to clear we changed out step two for the non acne solutions one. Then will have on hand for future flare ups should they occur. I love Clinique and it’s versatile options
customer_reviews.author: Connie Borth

customer_reviews.title: Increases Acne
customer_reviews.text: Broke my face out worse. Finally, I have stopped using it. The alcohol also dries my skin out, horribly. Several of my friends warned me about using this because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Just wish it was lasting results
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I've been using it for about a year now. It is good while I use it, but I noticed that if I stop using it, my face breaks out again.
customer_reviews.author: G Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Product is as described, although using these three products ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described, although using these three products dried my skin out unlike any product I've ever used. After about 3 days of use once each night my skin was extremely flaky, dry, and inflamed.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Richards

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product - just what my daughter was looking for - thanks for fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: its ok but not worth the cost, it'll probably last you about 2-3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Wajster

customer_reviews.title: Sensitve Skin
customer_reviews.text: Great for sensitive skin to clean and keep clear skin.
customer_reviews.author: DLJOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years and it has always helped my acne!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hoadley

customer_reviews.title: BYE BYE ACNE
customer_reviews.text: This trio actually cleared up my facial acne. I will definitely purchase this again. IT WORKS!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Trial size
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I expected, probably only 1 months worth if that.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this whenever my acne starts to act up-it works! Face clears up every time!
customer_reviews.author: Monique B

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this form my daughter, she loves it and her skin is looking clearer.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Michler

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It didn't see where it said it was travel size. Might want to look into that.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Sparkman- Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Made my acne worst and face
customer_reviews.text: This product dried my face to the point that I cannot wash it with anything and putting moisturizer hurts. Made my acne worst and face dryer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 1 month size
customer_reviews.text: I wanted my daughter to try this line. Perfect 1 month size.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bell
